Description: This template creates a stream processor for a given stream workspace in the specified project. The processor reads from a source connection (sample data, cluster, or Kafka) and merges data into a cluster connection collection.

Profile.Description: Secret Manager Profile that contains the Atlas Programmatic keys

WorkspaceName.Description: Human-readable label that identifies the stream processing workspace

ProcessorName.Description: Human-readable label that identifies the stream processor

SourceConnectionName.Description: Name of the source stream connection (e.g., sample_stream_solar for sample data, or a cluster/kafka connection name)

SinkConnectionName.Description: Name of the sink stream connection (must be a cluster connection)

SinkDatabase.Description: Name of the database for the sink connection

SinkCollection.Description: Name of the collection for the sink connection

DesiredState.Description: Desired state of the stream processor

ProcessorId.Description: Unique identifier of the stream processor

ProcessorState.Description: Current state of the stream processor from Atlas API
